application.name: getsn
application.description: This program will print the serial number for an image.

history.change: Fixed up, finished documentation and checked in
Changed category from Utility to Control Networks
Augmented observation number and added TO file with APPEND option
Added booleans for which keywords to get. If TO parameter is not entered output will go to console. Added results group to SessionLog and GuiLog (if applicable)

The print.prt file will now properly contain the results when getsn is run from the command line; before the results group was always empty. The "TerminalOutput" user preference no longer affects the output of this program. The default values of "FILE" and "OBSERVATION" have been changed to FALSE.
Added FORMAT option to choose between PVL and FLAT format. Effects output file only, default is still PVL.
Removed unreachable else clause that assumed more than two options are allowed to be entered in for the parameter FORMAT. Added test to default case to increase code coverage.

parameter.name: FROM
parameter.brief: Cube file to get the serial number for
parameter.description: The cube file containing the label the serial number is to be created for.

parameter.name: TO
parameter.brief: The text to append result Pvl
parameter.internalDefault: No Output file will be created
parameter.description: The text file in which the Result Pvl created is either appended or written to.

parameter.name: APPEND
parameter.description: Appends the created Results Pvl to the TO parameter output file. If this is set to false, then it write the results to the output file instead.

parameter.name: DEFAULT
parameter.brief: Allows serial number to default to the file name
parameter.description: Within the Result Pvl, if the serial number is not know, then Unknown is displayed in the keyword SerialNumber. If this parameter is set to TRUE, then is displays the input cube's filename is displayed in the keyword SerialNumber instead.

parameter.name: FILE
parameter.description: If this boolean is not checked then the filename will not be part of the output.

parameter.name: SN
parameter.description: If this boolean is not checked then the Serial Number will not be part of the output.

parameter.name: OBSERVATION
parameter.description: If this boolean is not checked then the Observation Number will not be part of the output.

parameter.name: FORMAT
parameter.description: Output format options, either PVL or FLAT may be used to display the selected outputs.

option.description: Output will be in Pvl format.
Output file in comma separated value, flatfile, format.
